allow: Bash(for file in proxies.html backends.html proxy.html backend.html dashboard.html config.html reports.html requests.html analytics.html alerts.html ip-management.html)
Bash(then sed -i '/<link rel=""stylesheet"" href=""\/public\/styles.css"">/a\    <link rel=""stylesheet"" href=""/public/nebula-pro.css"">' "$file")
Bash(for file in alerts.html analytics.html backend.html backends.html config.html dashboard.html domain.html domains.html ip-management.html login.html proxies.html reports.html requests.html)
Bash(do sed -i 's|<link rel=""stylesheet"" href=""/public/[^""]*\.css"">|<link rel=""stylesheet"" href=""/public/nebula-v2.css"">|g' "$file")
